item.title: EqualLogic VMware iSCSI Setup -- Part 2: Network Configuration
item.description: The EqualLogic iSCSI network consists of the switches, EqualLogic arrays and ESX hosts, all of which need configuring properly to make the most of each others load balancing, performance and availability features.
